statements: SELECT * FROM policy_performance_reports WHERE report_id = 101;
SELECT report_id, total_sales, report_date FROM policy_performance_reports WHERE policy_status = 'active';
SELECT customer_id, policy_id, report_date FROM policy_performance_reports WHERE total_sales > 5000;
SELECT * FROM policy_performance_reports WHERE customer_id = 201 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, policy_id, customer_id, total_sales FROM policy_performance_reports WHERE policy_id = 301 AND report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_performance_reports WHERE policy_status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_sales) as total_sales FROM policy_performance_reports GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) as customer_count FROM policy_performance_reports GROUP BY policy_id
SELECT AVG(total_sales) as average_sales FROM policy_performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM policy_performance_reports WHERE policy_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_type FROM PolicyPerformance WHERE claim_count > 100 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM Reports WHERE policy_id = 54321;
SELECT * FROM PolicyPerformance LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT report_name, customer_id FROM Reports WHERE policy_id = 1 ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT policy_name, policy_type, premium_amount FROM PolicyPerformance WHERE claim_count > 5 ORDER BY premium_amount DESC
SELECT report_id, report_name, policy_id, customer_id, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_id = 3
SELECT policy_id, SUM(premium_amount) AS total_premium FROM PolicyPerformance GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_premium > 10000
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policies WHERE policy_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM reports JOIN customers ON reports.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date, policy_type FROM reports r JOIN policies p ON r.policy_id = p.policy_id
SELECT r.*, c.customer_name, c.customer_email FROM reports r JOIN customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id
SELECT report_id, report_name, customer_name, customer_email, report_date FROM reports r JOIN customers c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id
SELECT report_id, report_name, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM reports r JOIN policies p ON r.policy_id = p.policy_id
SELECT * FROM policy_data;
SELECT policy_name, premium_amount FROM policy_data WHERE policy_type = 'Car';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customer_data ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT policy_id, customer_id, claim_amount FROM policy_performance WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, generation_date FROM report_history WHERE generation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY generation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_data WHERE policy_id = 'f477ad9c-5adc-4d67-9323-aa47b692cf87';
SELECT policy_name, premium_amount FROM policy_data WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_type, customer_name, email FROM policy_data JOIN customer_data ON policy_data.customer_id = customer_data.customer_id;
SELECT policy_name, claim_amount, claim_date FROM policy_data JOIN policy_performance ON policy_data.policy_id = policy_performance.policy_id;
SELECT report_name, generation_date, report_data FROM report_history WHERE generation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM ReportPolicies;
SELECT policy_name, start_date, end_date FROM ReportPolicies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM ReportCustomers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount, policy_status FROM PolicyData WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM ReportMetrics WHERE value < 50;
SELECT * FROM ReportCustomers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, start_date FROM ReportPolicies WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM ReportCustomers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(premium_amount) AS max_premium FROM PolicyData;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_rating FROM ReportCustomers JOIN CustomerFeedback ON ReportCustomers.customer_id = CustomerFeedback.customer_id;
